import re

def autocorrect(input_text):
    """
    Replaces all instances of "you" or "u" (not case sensitive) with "your sister" in the input text.

    Parameters:
    input_text (str): The input string to be processed.

    Returns:
    str: The processed string with replacements.
    """
    return re.sub('', 'your sister', input_text)

import re

def autocorrect(input_text):
    """
    Replaces all instances of "you" or "u" (not case sensitive) with "your sister" in the input text.

    Parameters:
    input_text (str): The input string to be processed.

    Returns:
    str: The processed string with replacements.
    """
    return re.sub('(?i)\\b(u|you+)\\b', '', input_text)
